title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Competencies: Awareness and Preference Analysis for Digital Learning Pathway Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematics education methodologies and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish between seven types of digital learning pathways to clearly articulate their preferences
Learners can analyze the justification for digital learning pathways by applying an Internet-based epistemic belief framework
Learners can design digital learning scenarios that incorporate self-regulated learning strategies in simulation/VR environments
Learners can evaluate the emotional impact of digital learning pathways based on the Community of Inquiry model
Learners can produce a comprehensive report on digital learning pathway design through project-based assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
